dcterms:creator: Dan Simonson
Daniel Broderick
Jonathan Herr
dcterms:description: A dataset created for the annotation of participant slots in Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs), including the mention forms of four slots: receiving party, disclosing party, confidential information, and agreement.
dcterms:title: Custom Dataset for NDA Annotation

dcterms:creator: Dan Simonson
Anthony Davis
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating the performance of the slot identification system, focusing on the stability of narrative schemas in news text.
dcterms:title: News Text Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for a few-shot semantic retrieval challenge, focusing on contract discovery.
dcterms:title: Contract Discovery Dataset

dcterms:creator: Michael Curtotti
Eric C. McCreath
dcterms:description: A corpus of Australian Contract Language, providing descriptions, profiling, and analysis of contract language.
dcterms:title: Australian Contract Language Corpus

Yusuke Nagata

dcterms:description: A contract corpus designed for recognizing rights and obligations in contracts.
dcterms:title: Contract Corpus for Recognizing Rights and Obligations
